text: Kare-ra wa arra ni,`(warui koto wa) nani mo iwanai.' To chikau. Daga kare-ra wa tashika ni fushinjin'na hanashi o shi, 1-do isuramu o ukeireta nochi fushinjin ni nari, joju shi enai koto o takuramu. Arra to shito ga, sono onkei ni yotte kare-ra o (senri-hin de) fuyu ni nasa rete iru koto ni taishite fukushu o shita nisuginai. Moshi kaigo surunaraba kare-ra no tame ni mottomo yoi. Moshi somuki sarunaraba, arra wa gense demo raise demo itamashi chobatsu de kare-ra o bassa reru. Kare-ra wa chijo ni, hogo-sha mo enjo-sha mo naidearou
